"Suffren": "You know that little grave off to the corner of the quintuplets' lodge?"
"That place isn't where Rysas is resting."
"It seems those kids made it to serve as their \"closure\" regarding the matter."
"Even so, it's just... That family's grave has remained unchanged since."
"I kinda just wanted to make an offering to it."
"Do you think you could get me some Refreshing Kvaris Plums?"
"Seeing how involved you are with those quintuplets, I think he'd really appreciate it."
